cause.description:
http://www.dresslikeapirate.com
Buy stuff there. Sasha needs the full treatment. Weaponry I'll get separately.
1. Pirates pwn.
2. If one has a [decent] Pirate costume, they pwn.
3. If we buy Sasha a Pirate costume, she will pwn. more.
cause.mission: Buy Sasha a full Pirate costume... for the good of... dresslikeapirate.com. I suppose.
cause.name: Dress Sasha Like a Pirate
